subject: Order #SSN3902
description_text:
Hello! 

I just received my package yesterday and I was surprised at how thin the box was considering how big the pedals are, so I opened the box only to find just the baseplate. I double checked my order to make sure I didn’t accidentally only purchase the baseplate somehow, but remembered it was $377 so surely it wasn’t just the baseplate. Can you help me find out where the pedals are? Appreciate the help! 



Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Philip Lee,    We apologize that the Pro X Ultra is currently out of stock at our US warehouse. We have urgently airfreighted a new shipment to replenish inventory, which is expected to arrive on Friday. We will ship your order immediately upon arrival. We sincerely apologize for the delay this has caused. We will refund the additional shipping charges for you.
